name: Fernando Alonso Díaz

structured_info.background: A Spanish racing driver, Fernando Alonso is a two-time Formula One World Champion (2005, 2006 with Renault), with 32 Grand Prix wins. He also has a successful career in endurance racing, including winning the 2018-19 FIA World Endurance Championship and two 24 Hours of Le Mans titles with Toyota.

summary: Fernando Alonso Díaz is a highly accomplished Spanish racing driver currently competing in Formula One for Aston Martin. He is a two-time World Champion and has demonstrated success in both Formula One and endurance racing, achieving wins at the 24 Hours of Le Mans and the FIA World Endurance Championship.

name: Luis María de Mavillanova

structured_info.background: Luis María de Mavillanova played a crucial role in the early career of Fernando Alonso, providing financial support - including his first kart - to Alonso and his family in 1990.

summary: Luis María de Mavillanova is a karting team owner and sponsor best known for his early support of Formula 1 driver Fernando Alonso, providing key financial assistance that enabled Alonso's initial karting endeavors.

name: Mike Wilson

structured_info.background: Mike Wilson is known for identifying promising racing talent, notably recognizing Fernando Alonso's potential and facilitating a testing opportunity for him in Parma, Italy.

summary: Mike Wilson is a racing talent scout with a proven eye for potential, having played a key role in the early career development of Formula 1 driver Fernando Alonso.

name: José Luis Echevarria

structured_info.background: José Luis Echevarria has experience supporting motorsports, specifically assisting in the early career development of Formula 1 driver Fernando Alonso in karting and providing mechanical support to his team.

summary: José Luis Echevarria is a Counselor and Mechanic with a background in motorsports, having played a role in supporting Fernando Alonso's karting career.

name: Lorenza Alonso

structured_info.background: Lorenza Alonso initially expressed reservations about her son Fernando Alonso's pursuit of a racing career, but ultimately became a supportive presence, actively engaging with his racing data and performance.

summary: Lorenza Alonso is the mother of Formula 1 driver Fernando Alonso. Though initially cautious about his racing ambitions, she grew to be a strong supporter, even involvement in analysing his on-track performance.
